A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Simply my favourite most rewarding Star Wars episode and I grew up with Star Wars. I saw A New Hope when I was 12. Many surprises in this movie (I saw the first showing after 3 hours sleep and didn't miss one second). This chapter prepares us for the exciting future ahead. I don't get how fans are slamming the storyline. I see Rian Johnson as a genius with an expendable vision of the future of the franchise.
